about_the_game:
“Seasons of Harvest - 8-Bit Farm BGM Pack” is an official RPG Maker music pack that brings the seasons to your game!
The track list covers Spring, Summer, Fall and Winter each of which has a different track for Morning and Evening. Composer Isiah Brighton uses chiptune instruments to make tracks that both capture the feel of each season and the bittersweet nostalgic feeling of playing old video games.
Whether you are making a visual novel, a farming sim or a cozy RPG: Seasons of Harvest Music Pack will bring on the vibes and help your game shine!

Features:
■ 8 BGM Tracks:
- Spring Morning
- Spring Evening
- Summer Morning
- Summer Evening
- Fall Morning
- Fall Evening
- Winter Morning
- Winter Evening

■ Available in .ogg, .m4a formats (looping variants included)
